title: Can't Accept Games Often
body:
Sometimes times when I hit accept on a match, this happens:
The accept-timer-bar goes empty and freezes there, but I actually am  in champ select. During this, I can be sent messages and see the party chat, but eventually I "dodge" and I get an error message when that happens. I have to close out of League to fix it.

Other times it works normally, just started happening today.

replies.body: When you are in queue, your network needs to transition you over to the same group to join everyone else.  A bad or block in your connection can cause you to lose sync or get left behind, which looks like the case here.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
